<h3 id="X10176">X(10176)&nbsp;=&nbsp;CENTER OF THE CENTROIDAL CONIC OF THE INNER-GARCIA TRIANGLE</h3>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; (b+c)*a^2-2*a*b*c-(b+c)*(b^2+b*c+c^2)  :  :  <p><b>
X(10176) = 2*r*X(5)-(3*R+2*r)*X(10)
</b></p>
<p>X(10176) lies on these lines:{1,748}, {2,758}, {3,3647}, {5,10}, {8,3884}, {9,48}, {21,3467}, {36,3219}, {43,4868}, {63,4973}, {65,3634}, {72,354}, {78,5248}, {140,5694}, {141,2836}, {145,4547}, {165,411}, {191,404}, {210,392}, {386,3725}, {518,551}, {549,2771}, {594,3032}, {595,5293}, {631,5693}, {632,5885}, {846,4256}, {899,4424}, {908,3822}, {912,5325}, {942,3848}, {956,3715}, {984,995}, {999,5220}, {1001,3940}, {1193,3989}, {1385,5302}, {1698,3754}, {2292,3216}, {2392,3917}, {2551,6902}, {2703,2758}, {2779,5891}, {2802,3679}, {2809,3789}, {2842,5650}, {3057,3626}, {3338,3951}, {3419,4679}, {3555,3636}, {3616,3881}, {3617,4540}, {3624,3868}, {3625,4662}, {3632,3890}, {3635,4533}, {3683,5440}, {3696,4717}, {3742,4525}, {3746,4420}, {3753,3828}, {3786,4653}, {3812,4084}, {3825,6734}, {3873,4532}, {3880,4669}, {3885,4668}, {3893,4746}, {3899,3968}, {3920,5315}, {3921,4745}, {3952,4692}, {3962,5439}, {3983,4691}, {4009,4125}, {4197,6701}, {4257,7262}, {4297,5777}, {4511,5251}, {4536,5550}, {4537,5045}, {4660,9519}, {4857,5178}, {5250,8715}, {5253,6763}, {5289,9708}, {5535,6946}, {5538,6912}, {5887,6684}, {6001,10164}, {6894,9812}</p>
<p>
X(10176) = midpoint of X(i),X(j) for these {i,j}: {1,3681}, {2,5692}, {72,354}, {210,392}, {551,4134}, {960,3740}, {3679,3877}, {4430,5904}<br>
X(10176) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (10,3740), (354,1125), (942,3848), (3679,3956), (3681,3678), (3740,5044), (3753,3828), (3874,354), (3892,551), (3898,392), (4430,3881), (5883,2), (5902,3833)<br>
X(10176) = anticomplement of X(3833)<br>
X(10176) = complement of X(5902)<br>
X(10176) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,3876,3678), (1,5506,5047), (2,5902,3833), (9,997,993), (10,960,3878), (10,3452,3814), (72,1125,3874), (140,5694,5884), (846,5529,4256), (960,5044,10), (993,997,214), (1698,3869,3754), (3057,3697,3626), (3616,5904,3881), (3833,5902,5883), (3881,3988,5904), (3884,4015,8), (5690,9711,10)<br>
